original_text: But as soon as I lifted up my voice and cried, he left his garment beside me and fled out of the house.”
korean_text: 내가 소리 질러 불렀더니 그가 그의 옷을 내게 버려두고 밖으로 도망하여 나갔나이다

sentences.original_text: But as soon as I lifted up my voice and cried
he left his garment beside me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 옷을 내 옆에 두고

sentences.original_text: and fled out of the house
